0.TEXT: Track your menstrual cycles with period, ovulation and fertility days. It also predicts your future periods so that you know your days and you can plan your future events accordingly.

1.TEXT: Add your moods and symptoms on your calendar days. This will help you to know how you were feeling.

2.TEXT: You can share your menstrual cycle’s history and future predictions with your Doctor or Partner. Now that’s helpful.

3.TEXT: Ads on mobile app can sometimes be annoying, so that’s why we said NO to Ads. Our app is free and easy to use. Hurray!!!

4.TEXT: This app is endorsed by Society of Obstetricians and Gynecologist of Pakistan another thumbs up.

5.TEXT: We know how important your privacy is, so we don’t gather and save your data on any server. Whatever you do in the app is with you.
